con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ext="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/topupsynchronous/external/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ext:topupSynchronous>\r <DirectRechargeServiceTopupDto>\r <!--type: int-->\r <amount>3</amount>\r <!--type: string-->\r <balanceType>2</balanceType>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: currency - enumeration: [EUR]-->\r <currency>EUR</currency>\r <!--type: string-->\r <msisdn>cum murmure</msisdn>\r <!--type: string-->\r <referenceId>aeoliam venit</referenceId>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <!--type: string-->\r <paymentUseCase>FULL_WITH_SMS</paymentUseCase>\r <iso8583>\r <!--type: string-->\r <terminalId>ventos tempestatesque</terminalId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <terminalTimestamp>temperat iras</terminalTimestamp>\r <!--type: string-->\r <terminalTraceNum>turbine corripuit</terminalTraceNum>\r <!--type: string-->\r <serverId>regemque dedit</serverId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <processingId>fremunt celsa</processingId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <partnerId>ferant rapidi</partnerId>\r </iso8583>\r </DirectRechargeServiceTopupDto>\r </ext:topupSynchronous>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
